body_text:
Have you tested manually that the timer is working the way you want, that there aren't unexpected changes to other timers, that unregister works etc? I think changing the system clock in a VM would be enough, or maybe just fiddling with the pref.
I can't imagine why there would be a problem from looking at the timer manager code and it has tests, but it's probably something to confirm, especially if we're going to uplift this so it won't spend a lot of time on Nightly.
This shouldn't block merging the code, I think it's worth at least manually double-checking.
